name: Select two random books and check if their details are displayed
fullName: src/tests/features/viewBookDetails.feature#Select two random books and check if their details are displayed
description:
As a Authenticated and Unauthenticated user
 I want to test Book details view functionality
 So that I can validate the behavior for different roles and scenarios.
